title: mikeywith
author: mikeywith
content: The M60s was announced a while ago, it's advertised as 1x.w/th (anything between 10w/th to 19.99w/th), we are likely going to get our hands on one of these pretty soon (the coming few days), we already know it's 18.5w/th at 182TH which is a huge improvement over the M50sThere will be a water-cooled version of it which does 360TH at about 20w/th.Will keep you updated.

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Excited for this one!If I remember correct the M60 series will be presented at the Blockchain Live 2023 in Dubai. This event is dated on the 24th of October this year. Nice to see that the Whatsminer are keepin on track besides Bitmain.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: I would like to get at least one of them for testing.

comments.author: Snixer
comments.body: I just got an email from them, for the lunch event of the M60 series there's currently a 100$ coupon off on everything on their official shop valid until 28/10/23.
